content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://testjinhostorage001.blob.core.windows.net/taxi/01/2020_Yellow_Taxi_Trip_Data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]



IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
    WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
           FORMAT_OPTIONS (
             FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
             FIRST_ROW = 2,
             USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
            ))
GO


    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [test-con_strgms000001_dfs_core_windows_net]
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'https://taxi@testjinhostorage001.blob.core.windows.net'
    )
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.ext_test (
    [VendorID] bigint,
    [tpep_pickup_datetime] nvarchar(100),
    [tpep_dropoff_datetime] nvarchar(100),
    [passenger_count] bigint,
    [trip_distance] float,
    [RatecodeID] bigint,
    [store_and_fwd_flag] nvarchar(100),
    [PULocationID] bigint,
    [DOLocationID] bigint,
    [payment_type] bigint,
    [fare_amount] float,
    [extra] float,
    [mta_tax] float,
    [tip_amount] float,
    [tolls_amount] float,
    [improvement_surcharge] float,
    [total_amount] float,
    [congestion_surcharge] float
    )
    WITH (
    LOCATION = '01/2020_Yellow_Taxi_Trip_Data.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = [test-con_strgms000001_dfs_core_windows_net],
    FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
    )
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.ext_test
GO
